## icons.CommentIcon.updateEditable() method

Updates the state of the bubble (editable / noneditable) to reflect the state of the bubble if the bubble is currently shown.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateEditable(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
